author: Blust
classification: Austronesian, Malayo-Polynesian, Central-Eastern Malayo-Polynesian, Eastern Malayo-Polynesian, Oceanic, Central-Eastern Oceanic, Southeast Solomonic, Gela-Guadalcanal, Bughotu

author: left
glottocode: cognate only in two lists from Bughotu

author: to walk
glottocode: only found in two Bughotu lists

author: liver
glottocode: this looks like a loan from NWSolomonic languages

author: tooth
glottocode: looks to be a loan from NWSols, where a similar form is found in Santa Isabel languages

author: to yawn
glottocode: irregular retention of POc word-final *p with addition of final vowel; possible NWSols loan

author: mother
glottocode: looks like a loan from Isabel languages

author: to steal
glottocode: looks to be a loan from Santa Isabel languages

author: to die, be dead
glottocode: looks to be loan from Santa Isabel languages

author: grass
glottocode: N; probably a loan from Santa Isabel languages

author: stone
glottocode: likely loan from Santa Isabel language

author: heavy
glottocode: probably a loan from Santa Isabel languages

author: thick
glottocode: probably a loan from Santa Isabel languages

author: new
glottocode: probably a loan from Santa Isabel languages

author: Ten
glottocode: Only used for numbers which are units of 10 and not units of 20.
